hashtag#W2

Job Role:Front End Angular Lead
Location - Remote

Job Description:

9+ years(senior) experience developing Angular UI Application for large scale applications,

Significant Angular 17 or higher development skills, including new features like Signals, the router.navigate input APIs, and deferrable views. Expertise with state management patterns and libraries such as NgRx or Signals-based approaches.

Strong analytical problem-solving skills and excellent written and verbal communication skills

akanksha.e@avanceservices.com

job_description:
Hi, 
Hope you are doing well!!
I have an urgent requirement with one of my clients. Please find the job details below and forward me your updated resume along with your contact details at Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com


Job Title: Lead Java Developer ‚Äì Spring Boot Microservices
Location: Onsite ‚Äì Las Vegas, NV (Local Candidates Only, No Relocation)
 
 
 
Job Summary
We are seeking a Lead Java Developer with strong hands-on experience in Java (1.8), Spring Boot Microservices, and RESTful API development. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of designing, developing, and maintaining scalable, high-performing web applications. This is an onsite-only position in Las Vegas, requiring strong leadership, debugging, and full-stack collaboration skills.
 
Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain high-performing RESTful services and APIs using Java and Spring Boot.
Build microservices-based architectures ensuring scalability, reliability, and performance.
Collaborate with front-end developers to deliver end-to-end integrated solutions.
Implement and maintain unit tests to ensure high code quality and defect-free releases.
Debug, troubleshoot, and optimize existing applications for performance and stability.
Analyze legacy code and implement improvements for maintainability and efficiency.
Design and build data processing jobs using Java, SQL, and scripting.
Work with SQL and NoSQL databases, ensuring efficient data handling and integration.
Utilize JavaScript frameworks (React preferred) for UI collaboration and integration.
Ensure web applications are responsive and meet modern UX/UI standards (HTML5, CSS3).
Manage and maintain version control and branching using Git.
Participate in Agile development ceremonies and support continuous delivery practices.
Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior developers.
 
Required Skills & Experience
6‚Äì8 years of professional software development experience.
Strong proficiency in Java 1.8+, Spring Boot, and Microservices architecture.
Expertise in developing and consuming RESTful APIs.
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases.
Familiarity with messaging systems and data integration workflows.
Solid understanding of object-oriented and procedural programming patterns.
Hands-on experience with React or other JavaScript frameworks.
Strong understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design principles.
Experience working on high-traffic, public-facing websites.
Proven ability to write unit tests and deliver maintainable, high-quality code.
Proficient with Git for source control and collaboration.
Excellent debugging, analytical, and communication skills.
Local to Las Vegas, NV ‚Äî no relocation or remote option available.

 

 Jitendra Singh
 Sr.Technical Recruiter
Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com

job_description:
Job Title: Full Stack Java Developer (Ex-Goldman Sachs Only ‚Äì No Interview)
Location: Richardson, TX
Visa: Must Be Genuine
Interview: No Interview‚ÄîDirect Offer
 
Experience Required: Must have worked at Goldman Sachs within the last 3 years

Position Overview
We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Java Developer who has recently worked with Goldman Sachs. This is a direct hire (no interview) opportunity for candidates with proven prior experience at Goldman Sachs.

You will be involved in developing, optimizing, and deploying large-scale financial applications that directly impact millions of consumers worldwide. As part of a high-performing engineering team, you will own your systems end-to-end‚Äîfrom design and development to deployment and operations.

Key Responsibilities
Back-End Development
Design, develop, and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices using Java and Spring Boot.
Implement business logic, manage database operations, and integrate with external services.
Optimize performance and ensure scalability of backend systems.
Front-End Development
Build responsive, user-friendly web applications using React.js, Angular, or Vue.js.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to deliver seamless, visually consistent interfaces.
Ensure cross-browser and mobile responsiveness.
Database Management
Design and manage relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB).
Write efficient SQL queries and optimize database performance.
DevOps & Deployment
Work closely with DevOps teams to deploy applications in cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP).
Support CI/CD automation and version control best practices.
Testing & Debugging
Write and execute unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure code reliability.
Debug, analyze logs, and resolve application issues promptly.
Required Skills & Experience
3‚Äì6 years of professional experience in software development.
Bachelor‚Äôs degree (or higher) in Computer Science or equivalent work experience.
Strong expertise in Java, React.js, HTML5, and RESTful Web Services.

Familiarity with:
Distributed systems and messaging frameworks (Kafka preferred)
Relational and NoSQL databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
Transactional services and microservice-based architecture
Agile methodologies and cross-functional collaboration

Preferred Qualifications
Experience developing microservices with Spring Boot and Kafka.
Knowledge of MongoDB and vert.x frameworks.
Strong understanding of distributed systems and scalable application design.

Why Join
Build next-generation financial systems with direct revenue impact.
Take full ownership‚Äîyou build it, you run it, you own it.
Collaborate with top engineers and global leaders in finance and technology.
Work in a culture that values innovation, autonomy, and excellence.

Reach me on ishraque@vyzeinc.com
